Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: There is an issue in 1.11.1~1338 with `anoncreds.to_unqualified(cred_offer_json)` if schema name has a space symbol. <<< Fixed in 1.11.1~1343

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: Libindy compatibility has been verified (last stable prover/issuer without FQDID against last master prover/issuer with FQDID) manually.

Action.author: vladimirwork
Action.body: Libvcx will be tested in scope of IS-1386.
